project.teaser: Power line and mining industries face challenges related to vegetation encroachmentand infrastructure monitoring. The inefficient monitoring of vegetation growth near power lines increases the risk of wildfires, while inadequate monitoring of mining infrastructure can lead to...
project.objective: Power line and mining industries face challenges related to vegetation encroachment and infrastructure monitoring. The inefficient monitoring of vegetation growth near power lines increases the risk of wildfires, while inadequate monitoring of mining infrastructure can lead to safety hazards and operational inefficiencies. The current solutions are often inefficient due to their high operational costs, time-consumption and low-quality output, since most of them are custom built for the specific application of end user. Therefore, by combining advanced sensor fusion technology and real-time monitoring AISPECO innovation IMC Aerie, offers a comprehensive and cost-efficient solution. The system's controller allows integration of various sensors, creating a live Digital Twin enabling efficient vegetation management and infrastructure integrity eliminating wildfire and slopes sliding risks offering safety improved operational efficiency. It follows principles of digitalization and implements Industry 5.0 standards, European Green Deal- reducing GHG & black carbon emissions, and contributes to SDGs.
project.title: Streamlining Geo mapping and Early Monitoring with an All-in-One Data Collection System for power line and mining industries
project.keywords: Sensor-fusion, Digital Twin, Real-time Inspection, LiDAR, Hyperspectral Imaging Edge-computing, Power lines management, Rail infrastructure, Network infrastructures, Energy Efficiency, Forestry, Envir

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
